articles.author: Pieter Haeck
articles.title: Brussels will be watching whether Musk breaks EU law in far-right livestream - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Up to 150 experts in Brussels and Seville will be checking whether Musk’s livestream interview boosts the German far right.
articles.content: The Commission hasnt yet imposed any of its potential DSA penalties. Fines could go as high as 6 percent of global yearly revenue, and regulators could order firms in breach to take action to stop an… [+1599 chars]
